entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
